code: import{createSlice}from'@reduxjs/toolkit';import{v4 as uuidv4}from'uuid';var initialBooks={books:[{id:uuidv4(),title:'A brief history of time',author:'Stephen Hawking'},{id:uuidv4(),title:'The alchemist',author:'Paulo Coelho'}]};export var booksSlice=createSlice({name:'books',initialState:initialBooks,reducers:{showBooks:function showBooks(state){return state;},addBook:function addBook(state,action){state.books.push(action.payload);},updateBook:function updateBook(state,action){var _action$payload=action.payload,id=_action$payload.id,title=_action$payload.title,author=_action$payload.author;var isBookExixt=state.books.filter(function(book){return book.id===id;});if(isBookExixt){isBookExixt[0].title=title;isBookExixt[0].author=author;}},deleteBook:function deleteBook(state,action){var id=action.payload;state.books=state.books.filter(function(book){return book.id!==id;});}}});var _booksSlice$actions=booksSlice.actions,showBooks=_booksSlice$actions.showBooks,addBook=_booksSlice$actions.addBook,deleteBook=_booksSlice$actions.deleteBook,updateBook=_booksSlice$actions.updateBook;export{showBooks,addBook,deleteBook,updateBook};export default booksSlice.reducer;
